name: zaizaizhao__mcp-swagger-server
description: MCP Swagger Server å°†ä»»ä½•ç¬¦åˆ OpenAPI/Swagger è§„èŒƒçš„ REST API è½¬æ¢ä¸º Model Context Protocol (MCP) æ ¼å¼ï¼Œè®© AI åŠ©æ‰‹èƒ½å¤Ÿç†è§£å’Œè°ƒç”¨æ‚¨çš„ APIã€‚

mcp_port.title: MCP Server Port
mcp_port.description: Port for the MCP server to listen on (via MCP_PORT environment variable).

mcp_transport.title: MCP Transport Protocol
mcp_transport.description: Transport protocol for the MCP server (stdio, sse, or streamable, via MCP_TRANSPORT environment variable).

mcp_openapi_url.title: OpenAPI Specification URL
mcp_openapi_url.description: URL or file path to the OpenAPI specification for the MCP server (via MCP_OPENAPI_URL environment variable).

mcp_auth_type.title: MCP Authentication Type
mcp_auth_type.description: Authentication type for the MCP server (e.g., bearer, via MCP_AUTH_TYPE environment variable).

api_token.title: API Bearer Token
api_token.description: Bearer token for authenticating with the target API (via API_TOKEN environment variable).

watch_files.title: Watch OpenAPI File for Changes
watch_files.description: Monitor the OpenAPI file for changes and automatically reload the server (passed as --watch argument).

verbose_logging.title: Enable Verbose Logging
verbose_logging.description: Enable detailed log output for debugging (passed as --verbose argument).

bearer_token_direct.title: Direct Bearer Token (Argument)
bearer_token_direct.description: Directly specify the Bearer Token for authentication via command-line argument (--bearer-token). Use this if not using an environment variable.

config_file_path.title: Configuration File Path
config_file_path.description: Path to a JSON configuration file for the MCP server (passed as --config argument).

# MCP Swagger Server(mss)
[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5+-blue.svg)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) [![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-16+-green.svg)](https://nodejs.org/) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE) [![Trust Score](https://archestra.ai/mcp-catalog/api/badge/quality/zaizaizhao/mcp-swagger-server)](https://archestra.ai/mcp-catalog/zaizaizhao__mcp-swagger-server) **ä¸€ä¸ªå°† OpenAPI/Swagger è§„èŒƒè½¬æ¢ä¸º Model Context Protocol (MCP) æ ¼å¼çš„å·¥å…·** é›¶é…ç½®å°†æ‚¨çš„ REST API è½¬æ¢ä¸º AI å¯è°ƒç”¨çš„å·¥å…· [ğŸš€ å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹](#å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹) â€¢ [ğŸ“– ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—](#ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—) â€¢ [ğŸ› ï¸ å¼€å‘](#å¼€å‘) **Languages**: [English](README_EN.md) | ä¸­æ–‡
--- ## ğŸ¯ é¡¹ç›®æˆªå›¾ ![é¡¹ç›®æˆªå›¾](./docs/img/mss.png) ![é¡¹ç›®æˆªå›¾](./docs/img/ui.png) ## ğŸ¯ é¡¹ç›®ç®€ä»‹ MCP Swagger Server æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå°† OpenAPI/Swagger è§„èŒƒè½¬æ¢ä¸º Model Context Protocol (MCP) æ ¼å¼çš„å·¥å…·ã€‚ ### ğŸ“¦ é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„ ``` mcp-swagger-server/ â”œâ”€â”€ packages/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ mcp-swagger-server/ # ğŸ”§ æ ¸å¿ƒ MCP æœåŠ¡å™¨ (å¯ç”¨) â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ mcp-swagger-parser/ # ğŸ“ OpenAPI è§£æå™¨ (å¯ç”¨) â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ mcp-swagger-ui/ # ğŸ¨ Web ç•Œé¢ (å¼€å‘ä¸­) â”‚ â””â”€â”€ mcp-swagger-api/ # ğŸ”— REST API åç«¯ (å¯ç”¨) â””â”€â”€ scripts/ # ğŸ”¨ æ„å»ºè„šæœ¬ ``` ### âœ¨ æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§ - **ğŸ”„ é›¶é…ç½®è½¬æ¢**: è¾“å…¥ OpenAPI è§„èŒƒï¼Œç«‹å³è·å¾— MCP å·¥å…· - **ğŸ¯ æ¸è¿›å¼å‘½ä»¤è¡Œ**: æä¾›é€æ­¥å¼•å¯¼çš„å‘½ä»¤è¡Œç•Œé¢ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·é…ç½® - **ğŸ”Œ å¤šä¼ è¾“åè®®**: æ”¯æŒ SSEã€Streamable å’Œ Stdio ä¼ è¾“ - **ğŸ” å®‰å…¨è®¤è¯**: æ”¯æŒ Bearer Token è®¤è¯ä¿æŠ¤ API è®¿é—® ## ğŸš€ å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹ ### ç¯å¢ƒè¦æ±‚ - Node.js â‰¥ 20.0.0 - pnpm â‰¥ 8.0.0 (æ¨è) ### å®‰è£… ```bash npm i mcp-swagger-server -g ``` ### å¿«é€Ÿå¯åŠ¨ #### è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯åŠ¨ ```bash mss ``` #### ä¸€é”®å¯åŠ¨ ```bash mss --openapi https://api.example.com/openapi.json --operation-filter-methods GET,POST --transport streamable -auth-type bearer --bearer-token "your-token-here" # ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ mcp-swagger-server --config config.json ``` #### å‘½ä»¤è¡Œé€‰é¡¹ ```bash # åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³• mss [é€‰é¡¹] # é€‰é¡¹ï¼š --openapi, -o OpenAPI è§„èŒƒçš„ URL æˆ–æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ --transport, -t ä¼ è¾“åè®® (stdio|sse|streamable) --port, -p ç«¯å£å· --watch, -w ç›‘æ§æ–‡ä»¶å˜åŒ– --verbose è¯¦ç»†æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡º # Bearer Token è®¤è¯é€‰é¡¹ï¼š --auth-type è®¤è¯ç±»å‹ (bearer) --bearer-token ç›´æ¥æŒ‡å®š Bearer Token --bearer-env ä»ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¯»å– Token --config, -c é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ # æ“ä½œè¿‡æ»¤é€‰é¡¹ï¼š --operation-filter-methods HTTPæ–¹æ³•è¿‡æ»¤ (å¯é‡å¤) [ç¤ºä¾‹: GET,POST] --operation-filter-paths è·¯å¾„è¿‡æ»¤ (æ”¯æŒé€šé…ç¬¦, å¯é‡å¤) [ç¤ºä¾‹: /api/*] --operation-filter-operation-ids æ“ä½œIDè¿‡æ»¤ (å¯é‡å¤) [ç¤ºä¾‹: getUserById] --operation-filter-status-codes çŠ¶æ€ç è¿‡æ»¤ (å¯é‡å¤) [ç¤ºä¾‹: 200,201] --operation-filter-parameters å‚æ•°è¿‡æ»¤ (å¯é‡å¤) [ç¤ºä¾‹: userId,name] ``` ### ğŸ” Bearer Token è®¤è¯ `mcp-swagger-server` æ”¯æŒ Bearer Token è®¤è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¿æŠ¤éœ€è¦èº«ä»½éªŒè¯çš„ API è®¿é—®ã€‚ #### è®¤è¯æ–¹å¼ **1. ç›´æ¥æŒ‡å®š Token** ```bash mss --auth-type bearer --bearer-token "your-token-here" --openapi https://api.example.com/openapi.json --transport streamable ``` #### ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡é…ç½® åˆ›å»º `.env` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š ```env # åŸºç¡€é…ç½® MCP_PORT=3322 MCP_TRANSPORT=stdio MCP_OPENAPI_URL=https://api.example.com/openapi.json # è®¤è¯é…ç½® MCP_AUTH_TYPE=bearer API_TOKEN=your-bearer-token-here ``` ### ğŸ¤– ä¸ AI åŠ©æ‰‹é›†æˆ #### Claude Desktop é…ç½® ```json { "mcpServers": { "swagger-converter": { "command": "mss", "args": [ "--openapi", "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/swagger.json", "--transport", "stdio" ] }, "secured-api": { "command": "mss", "args": [ "--openapi", "https://api.example.com/openapi.json", "--transport", "stdio", "--auth-type", "bearer", "--bearer-env", "API_TOKEN" ], "env": { "API_TOKEN": "your-bearer-token-here" } } } } ``` ## ğŸ› ï¸ å¼€å‘ ### æ„å»ºç³»ç»Ÿ ```bash # æ„å»ºæ‰€æœ‰åŒ… pnpm build # ä»…æ„å»ºåç«¯åŒ… pnpm build:packages # å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼ pnpm dev # æ¸…ç†æ„å»ºäº§ç‰© pnpm clean ``` ## ğŸ¤ è´¡çŒ® æ¬¢è¿è´¡çŒ®ï¼è¯·å…ˆé˜…è¯» [è´¡çŒ®æŒ‡å—](CONTRIBUTING.md)ã€‚ ## ğŸ“„ è®¸å¯è¯ MIT License - è¯¦è§ [LICENSE](LICENSE) æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ ---

raw_dependencies:
=== package.json ===
{
  "name": "mcp-swagger-monorepo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "MCP Swagger Server - A comprehensive monorepo for OpenAPI/Swagger to MCP conversion",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "build": "node scripts/build.js",
    "build:packages": "node scripts/build.js --non-ui",
    "prepack": "node scripts/build.js",
    "pack": "pnpm pack --filter mcp-swagger-server && pnpm pack --filter mcp-swagger-parser",
    "publish":"pnpm publish --filter mcp-swagger-server && pnpm publish --filter mcp-swagger-parser",
    "dev": "node scripts/dev.js",
    "dev:ui": "pnpm --filter=mcp-swagger-ui run dev",
    "clean": "node scripts/clean.js",
    "clean:build": "node scripts/clean.js --build-only",
    "diagnostic": "node scripts/diagnostic.js",
    "test": "pnpm -r run test",
    "lint": "pnpm -r run lint",
    "type-check": "pnpm -r run type-check"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "mcp",
    "swagger",
    "openapi",
    "monorepo",
    "model-context-protocol"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@changesets/changelog-github": "^0.5.1",
    "@changesets/cli": "^2.29.5",
    "@types/node": "^22.15.21",
    "cross-env": "^7.0.3",
    "nodemon": "^3.1.10",
    "rimraf": "^5.0.5",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.2",
    "tsconfig-paths": "^4.2.0",
    "tslib": "^2.8.1",
    "typescript": "^5.8.3"
  }
}
